titles.title: A bill to declare that certain costs incurred for emergency repairs and modifications to preserve the safety of the Conconully Dam are nonreimbursable and nonreturnable.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Water and Power Resources.

bill.summary: 3/17/1988--Introduced. Declares that certain costs incurred in 1969 for emergency repairs and modifications to preserve the safety of Conconully Dam, Okanogan Unit, Okanogan-Similkameen Division, Chief Joseph Dam Project, Washington, are nonreimbursable and nonreturnable.
